item.title: London, UK
item.description: London, England Travel date December 2022 Check other cities in United Kingdom London Here We Come Welcome to London! Start practicing your British accent and touch up on your British English dialect. Pro tip: Chips are French Fries and the lift is the elevator! I recommend at least 5 days in the city. London is a city that you can visit many times and always see something new. The Underground, AKA: The Subway No need to fear!
